constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 181 (Friday, October 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PALLONE:
H.R. 5596.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: [The Congress shall
have Power] To regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among the several States, and with the Indian Tribes
[Page H5639]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

title: Justice Against Malicious Algorithms Act of 2021
